text: The 2016–17 FIS Snowboard World Cup was 23rd multi race season in snowboarding. Competition consisted of the parallel slalom, parallel giant slalom, snowboard cross, halfpipe, slopestyle and big air. == Men == === Parallel === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff;
